features: 💎LARGE CAPACITY & EXPANDABLE：This extra large travel backpack with expandable feature offers you more packing capacity up to 40L.Unzipping to get larger storage space then can easily hold packing cubes, make-up bag, outfits, camera bag and gear for 3~7 days of travel.The carry on backpack fits overhead and under seat while on state of standard carry on size, is ideal for men, women, weekend traveler, or occasional vacationer.

💎EXTRA 4 PACKING CUBES:This weekend travel backpack comes with four packing cubes. large cube for sweaters, jackets, pants. Medium cube for shirts, shorts. Small water resistant cube with transparent side for providing clear overview of toiletries. there's also a shoe pocket. Keeping your belongings neater and more organized. Serve you well as carry on bags for airplanes, weekender backpack, personal item travel bag, overnight bag.

💎DESIGNED for TRAVEL:The luggage backpack is constructed to be most comfortable over hours of carrying, with multi-panel ventilated padding and adjustable and breathable straps which relieve the stress of the weight on your shoulders. Equipped with an adjustable chest strap, provides a better wearing experience. A luggage strap to attach the backpack to your suitcase. An anti-theft back pocket is suitable for valuables. Features a USB port, which means you can charge your phone on the go.

💎USB PORT DESIGN: With builtin USB charger outside and builtin charging cable inside, offers a more easier way to charge your phone while walking or cycling.This item is not intended for use by children 12 and under

💎MOST DURABLE & BEST GIFT CHOICE:The backpack for travel is made of durable, water-resistant polyester and anti-scratch material, which can provide protection on drizzle days. Sturdy metal double zipper and upgraded reinforced stitching make it last longer. With 40L capacity and 17” laptop storage, it can offers ample space yet is the perfect size for carry-on backpack. An amazing gift for men and women who love to travel, and the best choice for Father's Day, Christmas and other holiday gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice. Good quality. Spacious. I love that you can hide the straps especially if you are putting this under your airline seat. The packing cubes are great for organizing everything. And tge she bag is handy. It also has a zippered small mesh pocket in the packing area. In addition there’s another small zippered inside pocket in the packing area that’s hidden. The expandable feature is a plus. I wish they had more color selection, but this one will do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect carry-on for frontier. Super durable.
reviews.reviewText: I used this as a carry-on for a frontier flight and it fit perfectly. There is sooo much space in it. I was able to get about 6 days worth of clothes and essentials packed into it with no problem, which genuinely surprised me. It comes with packing cubes which really helped keep everything organized within the bag. It also came with a bag for shoes, which i love. Be careful not to overstuff it though, or it may not fit as a carry-on. The quality of this bag is superb. It held up so well for my trip! Not once did I worry about it falling apart or ripping. I love that it has the option to wear it as a backpack or to carry it duffel bag style with the handle on the side. The backpack straps can stow away inside a giant pocket when you dont need them which really helps save space. I love that there is a place to hook up your power bank inside and you're able to plug your charging cable into it on the outside. I honestly have no complaints with this bag. It served its purpose well and I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a sturdy, reliable bag for their next trip. I did not test the water resistance but the bag itself does feel like it would hold up if you have to go out in the rain without it ruining all your belongings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much better than I could have hoped for
reviews.reviewText: Turns out this is a very high quality bag, don't know if I'll still have it 20 years from now, but it's rugged and well designed and it's laid out nicely with lots of pockets and zippers and snaps and fasteners they keep everything in place. It is comfortable to wear I am 6'1, 220 lb and 67 years old and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used this as only luggage for two week trip. Holds alot and packs tight. Comfortable fit as back pack. Fit in overhead compartment easily and under seat if needed on flights. Only thing I disliked was when packed tight, outer pockets not useful as difficult to even put a book in or out. Great price and high quality. Very happy with this bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This backpack is more of a duffle to be honest. It’s very bulky & very large. The fact that it has so many different pockets was a huge sell for me. However, upon arrival the bag was far too large for a carry on after it has been packed. The coloring is beautiful, there is plenty of room for so many items & the overall quality is superb. It was just too large for my liking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel carry on !
reviews.reviewText: Our family traveled to Italy for two weeks. We used these instead of checking any bags. They are durable, meet carry on standards (not a personal item) and very comfortable to wear. I was able to pack 6 light weight outfits and one pair of shoes. The bag is very large, about the size of a carry on with lots of pockets, compartments and smaller pack bags provided. We were all very pleased with our bags, and because of the functionality these can be used for weekends, overnights, etc. and not just for plane travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it: perfect gift
reviews.reviewText: I got this for a loved one that travels often, and they loved it! They love the compartments and they stated that it fit the size requirements for the airline that they love to travel! They also said the charging compartment works really well! When I unboxed it, it didn’t seem too bulky and everything was there! Would definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This DOES meet the personal item requirements - mostly
reviews.reviewText: My biggest concern before purchasing this item was if it was going to comply with the airline’s personal item size requirements. I went searching online for 40 L backpacks to see if they did or did not meet the requirement, and found all sorts of mixed responses. I decided to take a gamble and see if I could get on board with the backpack - regardless of if the backpack satisfied personal item size requirements. The airport that I flew out of did not have a size checker and I got on board no problem. There was one at the arriving airport.The picture attached to this review is the backpack easily fitting inside the personal item size checker. However the bag is not completely filled to its limits either. This is with the extension zipper closed, the 4 side straps pulled tightly, and the bag not too overpacked. Inside the bag is a laptop and some electronics that go with that, five shirts, two pairs of pants, two pairs of shorts, some socks, toiletries, and one pair of shoes. Certainly enough to make it a few days, but not a whole lot extra on board. At this fill, it easily satisfied the personal item requirement. However, with the expansion zipper out, and the bag fully loaded it would not.As far as the bag itself, I am quite happy with it. I liked that the straps could be zipped inside of the bag so that it would look like a regular handled bag if I didn’t want to go with the backpack look. I feel like it is well-made and should hold up for a while. The backpack straps are comfortable and I like that it had the front latch to hold the straps together. Compartments and zippers are generous. I have not mastered the packing cubes yet, but everything online indicates the packing cubes make life even better in a bag like this. That’s for future experimentation.Happy with this bag. So much so that we are purchasing another one for my wife, who was jealous as I traveled. I will add just one more thing – this bag gets heavy as you load it up. I definitely missed having the weight on wheels as I went through the airport, but I also got away with no checked bag or carryon fees.

reviews.reviewTitle: By far the best backpack I have bought
reviews.reviewText: This bag is phenomenal. Well built, lot's of pockets and storage, looks nice, and would easily hold a massive amount of clothes. If you wanted to, you could very easily accidentally pack this thing so full it would no longer classify as a "personal item" on a plane haha. We bought a second one for my father as a gift.

Excelente mochila! Cumplió mis expectativas. Dude mucho en comprarla. Pero al ver las excelentes opiniones, vídeos y comentarios. Me anime. Fue una excelente compra. Materiales muy buenos. Viene tal cual la foto. La pedí de color negro. Viene con todos sus accesorios. Parece una mini maleta de viaje pero en versión mochila. Cabe perfectamente la laptop y algunas cosas de oficina. Ahí mismo pongo mi ropa para ir a nadar y hacer ejercicio sin problema. Además la uso de viaje porque le cabe muchas cosas también. Si recomiendo el producto para aquellas personas que buscan practicidad en llevar sus cosas de oficina y sus cosas de viaje. Además es el tamaño de una mochila normal es lo mejor de todo. Si la recomiendo ampliamente. Llego un día antes de la fecha estimada.

Als Daily für die Arbeit wahrscheinlich zu groß, aber als Handgepäcksruchsack super.Hier ist locker Platz für 2 Tage Klamotten.Mit den 4 "Packwürfeln" kann man dann seine Wäsche noch gut trennen oder nach Themen sortieren.Rucksack lässt sich auch, wie ein erweiterbarer koffer, recht einfach mittels Reißverschluss vergrößern.Sieht auch gut aus und wirkt nicht so steif wie ein Kabinentrolley.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was very surprised when I received this bag. I didn't expect it to be such good value. There is plenty of room for mini getaways. It looks smart and is made from durable fabric. I am very happy with my purchase.
